meanings.definition: The state of being without words or speech.
meanings.sent1: In the library, the wordlessness was so peaceful.
meanings.sent2: Her wordlessness during the argument spoke volumes.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's act relied on wordlessness for humor.
meanings.sent4: The wordlessness of the painting left viewers in awe.
meanings.sent5: The wordlessness of the forest at night was eerie.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of lacking words or verbal expression.
meanings.sent1: The wordlessness of the shy child was endearing.
meanings.sent2: His wordlessness in the meeting was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The awkward silence was filled with wordlessness.
meanings.sent4: The wordlessness of the situation was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The wordlessness of the starry sky was breathtaking.
